item.title: Dragon bow
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

unnecessary faces.
And make the string a TAD bit thicker. like 1 more line thicker.
And the shape of the bow, if you look closely, is diagonal, down, diagonal, down, ect. You want a solid curve.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon bow
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

[quote=“DemonsworldOwner, post:3, topic:336083”]The model base is shaped good.
It’s just the bow its self is a little bit to thin like glestrts said.
But You should make the string color darker rather than thicker, and the bow frame thicker, and the holding place strigher.[/quote]I wanted the string thinner but couldn’t scale the cylinder down anymore. I’ll probably make another version.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon bow
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

The model base is shaped good.
It’s just the bow its self is a little bit to thin like glestrts said.
But You should make the string color darker rather than thicker, and the bow frame thicker, and the holding place strigher.

Read full topic
